description: Latbio, founded on October 31, 2019, is an innovative initiative born from a group of friends passionate about agriculture. Focused on biodynamic practices, the company aims to market organic products, primarily bananas, while promoting sustainable farming methods. Through its ecosystem of companies, including Latitude Provisions and Caupa, Latbio processes non-exportable fruits and provides consulting services. The initiative strives to be a global leader in organic agriculture, emphasizing environmental responsibility and community support.
name: Latbio
